main event: Observers at Dobbins AFB GA reported a disc making passes on ground craft while being tracked by ground radar units.
interesting points: The object appeared stationary initially before moving off at high speed NNE., The altitude of the object was estimated to be 3,000 ft., The object was round, had a diameter of 50 ft, and was bright in color., Speed estimates varied from 300 mph to 450 mph by different observers., The weather was clear with visibility of approximately 15 miles during the sightings.
witness description: Lt Col Gun Crew Commander WMO
